author: TravisEz13
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
```
Add-Type -TypeDefinition @"
using System.Collections.Generic;
using  System.Runtime.InteropServices;

public class OutParam1
{
    public string Property1{get;set;}
}
public class InParam1
{
    public string Property1{get;set;}
}

public class OutExample3
{
   [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]
   public static bool OutExample(string result, out OutParam1 OutExample)
   {
        OutExample = new OutParam1(){
            Property1 = result
        };
        return true;
   } 

   public static bool OutExample(string result, InParam1 inParam1)
   {
      OutParam1 outExample = null;
      return OutExample(result, out outExample);
   } 

}

"@

Write-Verbose "Example 3 with null" -Verbose
[OutParam1]$result = $null
[OutExample3]::OutExample('example outparam1',[ref] $result)
Write-Verbose "$($result.Property1)" -Verbose

Write-Verbose "Example 3 with concrete object" -Verbose
[OutParam1]$result = [OutParam1]::new()
[OutExample3]::OutExample('example outparam1',[ref] $result)
Write-Verbose "$($result.Property1)" -Verbose
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
I should be able to call the method.  When I use a concrete object when ref is not required, the call works.

Actual behavior
---------------

Method calls fail with the following output
 
> VERBOSE: Example 3 with null
> Multiple ambiguous overloads found for "OutExample" and the argument count: "2".
> At C:\Users\tplunk\Desktop\SvnRepro1.3.ps1:37 char:1
> + [OutExample3]::OutExample('example outparam1',[ref] $result)
> + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>     + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodException
>     + FullyQualifiedErrorId : MethodCountCouldNotFindBest
>  
> VERBOSE: 
> VERBOSE: Example 3 with concrete object
> Multiple ambiguous overloads found for "OutExample" and the argument count: "2".
> At C:\Users\tplunk\Desktop\SvnRepro1.3.ps1:42 char:1
> + [OutExample3]::OutExample('example outparam1',[ref] $result)
> + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>     + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodException
>     + FullyQualifiedErrorId : MethodCountCouldNotFindBest
>  
> VERBOSE: 

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value                                                                                                                         
----                           -----                                                                                                                         
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.576                                                                                                                 
PSEdition                      Desktop                                                                                                                       
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                                       
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.576                                                                                                                
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000                                                                                                               
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                                           
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                           
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1 
```
title: No way to disambiguate a method call with an out parameter when similar overloads exist
